#summary List of available keywords and how they compares to their PHP counterparts.

= Deleted Keywords =
|| *PHP*         || *Snow*       || * Comment * ||                                   
|| as            || _deleted_    || ||
|| break         || _deleted_    || ||
|| foreach       || _deleted_    || ||
|| var           || _deleted_    || ||

= Changed Keywords =
|| *PHP*         || *Snow*       || * Comment * ||
|| elseif        || elif         || "else if" is disabled. ||            
|| enddeclare    || end          || ||            
|| endfor        || end          || ||            
|| endforeach    || end          || ||             
|| endif         || end          || ||   
|| endswitch     || end          || ||             
|| endwhile      || end          || ||
|| array()       || `[]`         || ||
|| instanceof    || isa          || ||
|| function      || fn           || ||

= New keywords =
|| *Snow*       || * Comment * ||
|| when         || Postfix if sentence. ||
|| overflow     || Disable default break in case sentences. ||
|| in           || Used with the new for loop type. ||
